players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to analyze everyone's behavior carefully. No one is above suspicion."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Diana is clear."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Charlie? Charlie died, so he was town. Your claim doesn't add up."
Bob: "I investigated Alice because I suspected her, not Charlie. My role is confirmed by the result: she is mafia. Diana, trust me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
